jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Frontend Developer to join our team in Munich. The ideal candidate should have experience with React, TypeScript, and modern web development practices.

Responsibilities:
- Develop user interfaces using React and TypeScript
- Collaborate with designers to implement UI/UX designs
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
- Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description:
As a Backend Engineer at DataFlow Systems, you will design and implement scalable APIs and services that power our data analytics platform.

Responsibilities:
- Design and develop backend services using Python and FastAPI
- Implement efficient database schemas and queries
- Ensure high performance and responsiveness of applications
- Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate user-facing elements

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
We're seeking a talented Full Stack Developer to work on our innovative healthcare platform.

Responsibilities:
- Develop both frontend and backend components
- Implement responsive design and ensure cross-browser compatibility
- Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
- Design and implement database schemas

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs.description:
Join our team as a Mobile App Developer to create engaging mobile experiences for our clients.

Responsibilities:
- Develop mobile applications using React Native
- Ensure the performance and quality of applications
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams
- Implement new features and maintain existing ones

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to help us build and maintain our cloud infrastructure.

Responsibilities:
- Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines
- Configure and maintain cloud infrastructure
- Automate deployment processes
- Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues
